channel.title: Need help with changing what stuff u equip when u 1st login?
channel.description: well basicly what the title sayes ?

item.title: Need help with changing what stuff u equip when u 1st login?
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

[quote=“ShadowShaft, post:6, topic:123361”][quote] //Giving the player a unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat]=ItemID; //hat
playerEquipment[playerCape]=ItemID; //cape
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=ItemID;//amulet
playerEquipment[playerChest]=ItemID; //chest
playerEquipment[playerShield]=ItemID; //shield
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=ItemID; //legs
playerEquipment[playerHands]=ItemID; //hands
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=ItemID; //boots
playerEquipment[playerRing]=ItemID; //ring
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=ItemID; //arrows
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=ItemID; //weapon[/quote][/quote]

Yup this is what u gotta do

Read full topic
